description: '''Tranquility Bass''' was the stage name of '''Michael Adam Kandel''' (1967/1968 â€“ May 17, 2015), an American musician whose music has been variously categorized as [[ambient house]], [[trip hop]], and [[funk rock]]. He released various singles during the 1990s, followed by his first full-length album, ''Let The Freak Flag Fly'', in 1997 on [[Astralwerks]].
